channel.title: Douglas County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Douglas County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-50 East at NV-28
item.description: US-50 East at NV-28 in Douglas County

item.title: US-50 East Approaching NV-28
item.description: US-50 East approaching NV-28 in Douglas County. NV-28 loops around the northeast side of Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 East - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on US-50 east in Nevada. Distance to Zephyr Cove, Jct SR-28, and Carson City.

item.title: US-50 East at NV-207 East
item.description: US-50 East at NV-207 East to Minden and (Heavenly Valley) Ski Area. Continue east on US-50 for Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching US-50 and I-580
item.description: US-395 North approaching US-50 and I-580 in Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North at NV-88 - Minden
item.description: US-395 North at NV-88 in Minden. Turn left for NV-88 west.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching NV-88
item.description: US-395 North approaching NV-88 in Minden. Use NV-88 west to Woodfords (California) and Lake Tahoe. Continue north on US-395 for Carson City and Reno.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching NV-88
item.description: US-395 North approaching NV-88 in Minden.

item.title: US-395 North - Simee Dimeh Summit
item.description: Simee Dimeh Summit on US-395 North - Elevation 5987 Feet.

item.title: US-395 North - NV-208 Junction
item.description: US-395 north at NV-208 east to Yerrington. Continue north on US-395 for Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching NV-208 - Holbrook Junction
item.description: US-395 North approaching NV-208 - Holbrook Junction.

item.title: US-395 North - Topaz Lake
item.description: US-395 north shield in Topaz Lake. This is the first US-395 shield northbound in Nevada.

item.title: US-395 North - Topaz Lake
item.description: Entering Topaz Lake on US-395 north. Topaz Lake is a small community on the shore of Topaz Lake on the California-Nevada state line.

item.title: US-395 North - Welcome to Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-395 north. Taken at the California - Nevada state line.

item.title: US-50 East - Spooner Summit
item.description: Spooner Summit on US-50 east - Elevation 7146 Feet. Spooner Summit is a pass through the Carson Range.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching NV-28
item.description: US-50 East approaching NV-28 in Douglas County. NV-28 loops around the northeast side of Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 East at NV-207 East
item.description: US-50 East at NV-207 East to Minden and (Heavenly Valley) Ski Area. Continue east on US-50 for Carson City.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching NV-207
item.description: US-50 East approaching NV-207 (Kingsbury Grade).

item.title: US-395 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 south. Distance to Coleville, Walker, and Bishop. All three of these places are in California. This is the last distance marker on US-395 southbound.

item.title: End NV-208 West at US-395
item.description: End NV-208 West at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Carson City; left for US-395 south to Bishop (California).

item.title: End NV-208 West at US-395
item.description: End NV-208 West at US-395 in Douglas County.

item.title: NV-208 West at US-395
item.description: NV-208 West at US-395 in Douglas County.

item.title: NV-208 West Approaching US-395
item.description: NV-208 West approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Carson City; use US-395 south for Bishop (California).

item.title: NV-208 West Approaching US-395
item.description: NV-208 West approaching US-395 in Douglas County.

item.title: NV-208 West - Jack Wright Pass
item.description: Jack Wright Pass - Elevation 5484 Feet.

item.title: US-395 North at NV-759
item.description: US-395 north at NV-759 East (Airport Road).

item.title: US-395 North at NV-206
item.description: US-395 North at NV-206 (Genoa Lane) jct.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching NV-206
item.description: US-395 north approaching NV-206 - Genoa Lane.

item.title: US-395 North at NV-757
item.description: US-395 north at NV-757 west.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching NV-757
item.description: US-395 North approaching NV-757 west to Kingsbury Grade and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: End NV-88 North at US-395
item.description: End NV-88 North at US-395 in Minden. Use US-395 north for Carson City; US-395 south for Minden.

item.title: End NV-88 North at US-395
item.description: End NV-88 at US-395 in Minden.

item.title: NV-88 North Approaching US-395
item.description: NV-88 North approaching US-395 in Minden.

item.title: NV-88 North at Mottsville Lane/Waterloo Lane
item.description: NV-88 North at Mottsville Lane/Waterloo Lane. Use Mottsville Lane west for NV-207/Kingsbury Grade/Lake Tahoe.

item.title: NV-88 North approaching Mottsville Lane/Waterloo Lane Jct.
item.description: NV-88 North approaching Mottsville Lane/Waterloo Lane junction. Use Mottsville Lane west for NV-207 and Lake Tahoe (via Kingsbury Grade).

item.title: NV-88 North at NV-756
item.description: NV-88 north at NV-756 (Centerville Lane) in Gardnerville.

item.title: NV-88 North - Gardnerville
item.description: Gardnerville - Elevation 4750 Feet on NV-88 North. Approaching NV-756 junction (Centerville Lane) for access to Golf Course.

item.description: NV-88 North approaching NV-206 in Douglas County.

item.title: Begin NV-88 North
item.description: Begin NV-88 north, just north of the California - Nevada line.

item.title: NV-88 North - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-88 north. Taken at the California - Nevada line.

item.description: US-50 south approaching NV-207 east to Kingsbury Grade and Minden.

item.description: US-50 west to South Lake Tahoe, at NV-28 north to Incline Village.

item.description: End NV-207 shield at NV-206 junction at eastern end of Daggett Pass, Douglas County.
